Vulois looked down from the rafters at Battera. Then he realizes that 
this is a perfect opportunity. New Pred, not much loyalty. This might 
be a good chance to recruit. Or it could just reveal his hiding 
place. But he has to take that chance or his eveolved group won't 
have a chance. Besides, his new body can probably take Battera. He 
yells down.

"I'm the one who can give you new purpose in life. How about joining 
me?"
